scripts.mobile: cd packages/mobile && adb reverse tcp:5173 tcp:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEVICE=mobile DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 npx cap run android
scripts.emulator: npm run android:boot && cd packages/mobile && adb reverse tcp:5173 tcp:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEVICE=emulator DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 npx cap run android --no-sync
scripts.openAndroid: npm run android:boot && cd packages/mobile && adb reverse tcp:5173 tcp:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEVICE=emulator DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 npx cap open android --no-sync
scripts.desktop: cd packages/desktop && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.buildMobile: (cd packages/web && npm run build) && (cd packages/mobile && npx cap copy android) && (cd packages/mobile/android && ./gradlew assembleDebug)
scripts.buildDesktop: cd packages/web && npm run build && cd ../desktop && npm run electronBuild
scripts.android:boot: sh -lc 'adb start-server; AVD=${EMULATOR_NAME:-$($ANDROID_HOME/emulator/emulator -list-avds | head -n1)}; test -n "$AVD" || { echo no AVD; exit 1; }; if ! adb devices | grep -q "emulator-.*device"; then nohup "$ANDROID_HOME/emulator/emulator" -avd "$AVD" -no-snapshot -netdelay none -netspeed full >/dev/null 2>&1 & fi; until adb devices | grep -q "emulator-.*device"; do sleep 2; done'
